plot: Rebel and his rich girlfriend run away from home, because the girl's parents are against their romance. But they get casually involved in a murder and are relentlessly chased by the police.
title: Eendag vir Altyd
plot_es: Rebel and his rich girlfriend run away from home, because the girl's parents are against their romance. But they get casually involved in a murder and are relentlessly chased by the police.
plot_en: Rebel and his rich girlfriend run away from home, because the girl's parents are against their romance. But they get casually involved in a murder and are relentlessly chased by the police.
